Wedding

May 26, 2018

Ceremony at 11AM

Location

UMD Memorial Chapel
7600 Baltimore Ave
College Park, MD 20740

We had some very special memories at the Chapel and its garden from even before we started dating, and felt coming back to where it all started was the best way to celebrate the beginning of our future!

Parking

Free parking is available at Lots Y, C2, and C1. The closest is Lot Y, right behind the Chapel.

The Chapel must be entered via the front entrance facing Regents Drive.

Avoid parking in any metered or service spaces, or you may be fined by UMD.

Reception at 6pm

Location

New Fortune
16515 S Frederick Ave
Gaithersburg, MD 20877

Our reception dinner will be held at New Fortune in Gaithersburg, Maryland. It will be a Chinese-style wedding reception, with a full-course menu served “family style”.

Parking

There is plenty of parking in the main lot directly outside of the restaurant.

Meet the Wedding Party

Groomsmen

David Cosiem

Best Man

Although we first met at the bus stop back in sixth grade, we became inseparable in college, where we were roommates for four years. Those four years were filled with countless nights of late night talks and many of my favorite memories of college.
